amendment.description: To provide for funding the increased number of Army active-duty personnel out of fiscal year 2005 supplemental funding.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3450 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3450 proposed by Senator Warner to Amendment SA 3352. (consideration: CR S6780-6784; text: CR S6780) To provide for funding the increased number of Army active-duty personnel out of fiscal year 2005 supplemental funding.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3450 proposed by Senator Warner to Amendment SA 3352.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3450 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
